text: Trump's top economic adviser believes a carbon tax could reduce greenhouse gas emissions without harming the economy. Yesterday, he didn't disavow his support for the idea, which could become a bridge between liberal and conservative climate policy:
author: scottpwaldman

text: “I’m very proud to hear the president use the term ‘fake news.’” @realDonaldTrump said after Bolsonaro used his signature phrase in the Rose Garden before an audience of reporters.

text: Will we hear about road-building in the Amazon or why Brazil may stay in the Paris climate agreement?

text: Extreme precipitation events that cause significant flooding are made more likely by climate change, and expected to increase in the future. This is one of the ways climate change threatens the security of Americans.
author: scottpwaldman
